title: Using Stride, Inc, (ticker: LRN) 10-K for fiscal year ended June 30, 2025 calculate the year over year % change of enrollment per school (defined as enrollment for the year divided by number of schools where school-as-service offering was provided during corresponding school year) for Career Learning segment from FY2024 to FY2025. Show answer in % rounded to 2 decimals.
description:
1. Find enrollments for FY2025 and FY2024 from the FY2025 10-K Enrollment Data table (located in MD&A section) for Career Learning business segment: 
 FY2025 = 96.3 thousand; 
 FY2024 = 72.7 thousand.
 
 2. Extract the number of schools/programs where School-as-a-Service was provided in the Career Learning market for each corresponding school year (located in "ITEM 1. BUSINESS" section) in 10-k's for FY2025 and FY2024, respectively: 
 2024–2025 school year = 56; 
 2023–2024 school year = 56. 
 
 3. Compute enrollment per school for each year by dividing enrollment by number of schools: 
 FY2025 = 96,300 ÷ 56 = 1,719.64 students per school 
 FY2024 = 72,700 ÷ 56 = 1,298.21 students per school.
 
 4. Calculate YoY % change of enrollment per school from FY2024 to FY2025:
  [(1,719.64 − 1,298.21) ÷ 1,298.21] × 100 = 32.46%

rubric.criteria: FY2025 Career Learning enrollment (data located in FY2025 10-K Enrollment Data table (MD&A section))= 96.3 thousand.
FY2024 Career Learning enrollment (data located in FY2025 10-K Enrollment Data table (MD&A section))= 72.7 thousand.
Number of schools where School-as-a-Service offering was provided in the 2024–2025 school year (data located in ITEM 1. BUSINESS section of FY2025 10-k) for Career learning segment= 56.
Number of schools where School-as-a-Service offering was provided in the 2023–2024 school year (data located in ITEM 1. BUSINESS section of FY2024 10-k) for Career learning segment= 56.
Enrollment per school for FY2025 = 96,300 ÷ 56 = 1,719.64 students per school.
Computed enrollment per school for FY2024 = 72,700 ÷ 56 = 1,298.21 students per school.
Year-over-year percentage change in enrollment per school from FY2024 to FY2025 = [(1,719.64 − 1,298.21) ÷ 1,298.21] × 100 = 32.46%
